biocontainers.name: seqstats
biocontainers.summary: Quick summary statistics on fasta/fastq(.gz) files

biotools.summary: seqstats package provides a comprehensive framework for biological sequence statistics to allow researchers to design null hypotheses and random controls when performing exploratory genomics studies.

bioschemas.name: seqstats
bioschemas.summary: seqstats package provides a comprehensive framework for biological sequence statistics to allow researchers to design null hypotheses and random controls when performing exploratory genomics studies.
